text_block_list.name: Mr. C.B.
text_block_list.text: Wow! This yakisoba pan is so freaking tasty!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: You like it? I'm glad to hear that. Every time I come to this shopping district, I just can't not buy one.

text_block_list.name: Bakery Owner
text_block_list.text: Nei-chan, you really do love our yakisoba pan, don't you. I'm always glad to see you enjoying our food so much whenever you come in.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Oh, come on ma'am, you don't need to hear that from me. If anything, you really should advertise your bread more!

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: Nature! I wanna eat some croquettes! The ones from before!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: You really like those croquettes, huh. Mister, can I get one croquette please?

text_block_list.name: Meat Shop Owner
text_block_list.text: Of course! Everyone, would you like a menchi-katsu as well? Nature is always buying those for dinner and it's the pride of our shop!

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: Woah, that looks so good! I'll take one!

text_block_list.name: Mr. C.B.
text_block_list.text: This shopping district feels quite homely. The people here are also very kind.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Yes, if I were to describe this place, it would be tender and amiable.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: I'm honored to hear you say that. To me, this place is like my backyard.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: If Turbo sees the arcade as a place to get energized, I see this shopping district as a place where I can take it easy. Or how do I put it…

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Like after I'm able to gather my mind here, I feel like I can be all like "alright, let's go for it!" and run well.

text_block_list.name: Mr. C.B.
text_block_list.text: I like it. This is your "high-spirit spot" then.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Ah ha ha… I feel kind of embarrassed saying it out loud…

text_block_list.name: Mr. C.B.
text_block_list.text: Mmmmm… Well, I got a good chance to get a feel for this place. Guess I'm up next.

text_block_list.name: Mr. C.B.
text_block_list.text: Alright, we're here.

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: Wait, this is just your normal riverside! C.B., this is your "high-spirit spot?"

text_block_list.name: Mr. C.B.
text_block_list.text: Yup. I'm thinking here today. Feel it? The wind, the color of the sky. It all feels incredible.

text_block_list.name: Mr. C.B.
text_block_list.text: Look up to the sky. Like the encroaching red sunset, you want to move faster than the wind.

text_block_list.name: Mr. C.B.
text_block_list.text: And from there, you get the desire to run just like it. And before you know it, the sun is setting, and you stop.

text_block_list.name: Mr. C.B.
text_block_list.text: And all you can think about is the desire to race. At least, that's what I enjoy about this place.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: That's deep.

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: Yeah, yeah! That's pretty cool! Let's see. I can't really put it in words, but… yeah, I get you!

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Yes. I'm sure that is part of our instinct. That is what moves us forward.

text_block_list.name: Mr. C.B.
text_block_list.text: Well, that's it for me. Let's go on to our last spot.

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: Wow! We're so high up!

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: Feels great, right!? The view up here is always the best!

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: Hey, Ace! Is that place over there Tracen Academy?

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: Oh, you got good eyes, Turbo! That's right. Here, you can get a good view of everything around the school!

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: If I just stay at the school, I am only seeing a small part of the world. Being up here reminds me that the sky is much wider than I can imagine.

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: That makes me excited to think about. Just thinking about it makes my dream feel red hot!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: What exactly is your dream, Ace?

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: Hmm!

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: I only dream about one thing! All that talk about common sense and tall hurdles to cross! I want to become the one to tear them all down!

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: I won't be afraid of anyone that I'm up against!! I won't run away from any race! I want to prove to everyone that nothing is impossible!

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: The "Ace" of the horsegirl world! That is who I dream to be!!

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: Turbo! Nature! Rudolf! C.B.! All of you and the rest of the world! One day I'll be the one to take you all down!!

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: After all, "Katsuragi Ace" is standing proud right here!!

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: Wow, wow, wow! I'm getting really into this too! For me, my legs are the "turbo" that carry me forth!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Ha ha. It seems that we all view the scenery a bit differently. Still, continuously looking forward doesn't seem so bad.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: It seems that one day I will come to face that burning passion of yours. I'm excited for when that day comes, Katsuragi Ace.

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: Hahhhhh! Anyways, today was really fun!!

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Yes. Today was a meaningful experience. Today we all presented our own unique locations, but the core element of each was the same.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: In other words: "I wish to run with all I got tomorrow." It is that way of thinking that brings forth the emotions we have.

text_block_list.name: Mr. C.B.
text_block_list.text: And that will be the "student body's high-spirited place," I'm guessing. You know what you will do for the pamphlet?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Of course. Next, I need to determine the guidelines.

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: Wait, Rudolf. Didn't you get one part of that wrong?

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: It's not "tomorrow," it's supposed to be "now," isn't it?! That being said, let's run back to the academy!

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: Me too, me too! Let's all run back together!!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Ugh, aren't you two getting too into this…?!

text_block_list.name: Mr. C.B.
text_block_list.text: Ha ha, sure, why not!? Sounds fun.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Well, well. Aren't you all just overflowing with energy.

text_block_list.name: Academy Horsegirl A
text_block_list.text: Woah! I heard that to create the student pamphlet, the student council is looking for submissions directly from the students! Maybe they'll take some of the photos we took!

text_block_list.name: Academy Horsegirl B
text_block_list.text: Isn't it rare for the student council to be asking the students for something like this? Oh, it looks like they're looking for videos too. Maybe I'll help out.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: Hmmmm… Well, isn't this is something…
